name: Ice Winter Fishing 3D
description:
Gain ultimate winter fishing experience with Ice Winter Fishing 3D!

Check your skills playing this fishing simulator cast a line, use suitable baits and hooks and finally catch the fish! Use rod or spinning. If the hook is empty, put the bait on it. Different fish species are biting on different bites: gammarus, bloodworms, little fish and more!

Are you ready for extreme fishing experience? It’s not like casting a line on a seaside, lake or river! Drill holes in icebound rivers and lakes and wait for the fish to get lured by your bait with this winter fishing simulator. Put the gear in the water and cast out the fishing line. Attract fishing by teasing - raise and lower the bait – fish may start biting quicker! If the spring bobber is moving – pull up the rod out of water and check your hook! Get the fish out of icy water before it falls off the hook. Get rich loot with this winter fishing simulator in 3D living the life of a fisherman! Harsh cold, thick ice, cold hands, rods, baits and spoons… Upgrade your fisherman’s skill in such extereme conditions not to let fish any chance to get off your hook! Enjoy Ice Winter Fishing 3D – realistic winter conditions, wide arsenal of tackles, rods, hooks and baits, rivers and lakes teeming with all fish species… Seem like a fisherman’s paradise!

Put the gear in the water, cast out the fishing line, tease fish by raise and lower the bait and get the fish out of icy water before it falls off the hook! Catch the fish immediately pulling up the rod or spinning with this winter fishing simulator! Be accurate and fish won’t have a chance to get off your hook! Bait the hook again and start new extreme winter fishing adventure! Try Ice Winter Fishing 3D and watch the spring bobber and be ready to get rich loot! Are your afraid of cold? Gain ultimate winter fishing experience drilling the ice and casting the line with your cold hands!

Ice Winter Fishing 3D features:

- Realistic winter fishing simulator - put the gear, cast out the fishing line, tease fish by raise and lower the bait and get the fish out before it falls off the hook!
- Wide tackles arsenal - rods, spinning, baits, spoons and hooks
- Different fish species
- Fisherman’s shop to buy or upgrade your tackles

Rivers and lakes are teeming with all fish species – just drill a hole in the ice to start fishing! Try this fishing simulator and enjoy amazing winter views waiting till the fish starts biting! Upgrade your skill to prove your worth as a fisherman with Ice Winter Fishing 3D simulator!
